item.title: JavaScriptCore Intricacies During Feature Development
item.description: How to get test coverage and debug a new JS feature in JavaScriptCore

item.title: Hanging in the Shadow Realm with JavaScriptCore
item.description: An introduction to implementing new JS features in JavaScriptCore

item.title: Contract Verification using Symbolic Execution
item.description: An introduction to contracts, symbolic execution, and how to use the latter the verify the former.

item.title: An Introduction to Compiler Verification
item.description: What does it mean to verify a compiler correct? Why is compiler verification important? Here I will provide an introduction to the area of compiler verification.

item.title: Modeling "The Essence of Compiling with Continuations"
item.description: On applying lightweight modeling to a classic Programming Languages paper studying the connection between A-Normal Form and Continuation Passing Style.

item.title: Monads: How do they work?
item.description: One more blog post on Monads joins the millions already present on the Internet. These are my notes on Monads as I prepare to give an intro lecture on them.
